com.ecomDomain.reuseMethods

Class Wallet_Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ecomDomain.reuseMethods.Wallet_Util

  • public class Wallet_Util
extends java.lang.Object
    Re-Usable methods of Terms and Policies Functionality for Retail Sites Also created re-usable methods for DemandWare business flows Some of the DW methods can be optimized and use for other platform based retail site also
    Author:
    sudharsan.srinivasan

      • verifyAddCardButtonDisabledOnReachingCount

        public static final void verifyAddCardButtonDisabledOnReachingCount(java.lang.String addCardButton,
                                                                    java.lang.String cardLink,
                                                                    int maximumCardsCount,
                                                                    org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver)
        Verify whether the Add card button is disabled on reaching the max count of cards to be listed in the page.
        Parameters:
        addCardButton - : String which is the css of the Add Card button
        cardLink - : String which is the css of the Card links that are listed in the page
        maximumCardsCount - : Integer which is the expected maximum number of cards that are to be present in the page
        driver - : WebDriver instance
